subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant roused the 20,809 fans in Philadelphia who came to jeer him, scoring 24 points to Allen Iverson’s 23 and leading the Lakers past the 76ers.
snippet: Kobe Bryant roused the 20,809 fans in Philadelphia who came to jeer him, scoring 24 points to Allen Iverson’s 23 and leading the Lakers past the 76ers.
